targets.target:
#!/usr/bin/env bash
# Fail fast and fail hard. set -eox pipefail
# Settings DRUPAL_VERION=7.28
db_root_password=$(ss-get db_root_password) db_user=$(ss-get db_user) db_password=$(ss-get db_password) db_name='drupal' db_type='mysql' site_name=$(ss-get site_name) site_email=$(ss-get site_email) admin_user=$(ss-get admin_user) admin_password=$(ss-get admin_password) admin_email=$(ss-get admin_email)
ss-display "Installing EPEL" yum -y localinstall http://mirror.switch.ch/ftp/mirror/epel/6/i386/epel-release-6-8.noarch.rpm
ss-display "Installing MySQL" yum install -y mysql mysql-server
service mysqld start chkconfig mysqld on
ss-display "Configuring the database" mysqladmin -u root password $db_root_password mysqladmin -u root -p$db_root_password create $db_name mysql -u root -p$db_root_password -e "create user '$db_user'@'localhost' identified by '$db_password'"; mysql -u root -p$db_root_password -e "grant all privileges on $db_name.* to '$db_user'@'localhost'";
yum install -y httpd php-mysql php-devel php-gd php-drush-drush
ss-display "Installing Drupal-${DRUPAL_VERION}" drush dl drupal-${DRUPAL_VERION} \ --drupal-project-rename=drupal \ --destination=/var/www/html/
chown -R apache.apache /var/www/html/drupal cd /var/www/html/drupal
ss-display "Configuring Drupal-${DRUPAL_VERION}" yes | drush site-install standard \ --account-name=${admin_user} \ --account-pass=${admin_password} \ --account-mail=${admin_email} \ --db-su=${db_user} \ --db-su-pw=${db_password} \ --locale=en \ --site-mail=${site_email} \ --site-name="${site_name}" \ --clean-url=0 \ --db-url=mysql://root:${db_root_password}@localhost/${db_name} || true
mkdir -p /var/www/html/drupal/sites/default/files chown -R apache.apache /var/www/html/drupal/sites/default/files
iptables -I INPUT 1 -m state --state NEW -m tcp -p tcp --dport 80 -j ACCEPT iptables-save > /etc/sysconfig/iptables
service httpd start chkconfig httpd on
hostname=$(ss-get hostname) ss-set ss:url.service http://${hostname}/drupal
ss-display "Drupal is ready to go!"
